ComicInfo.Title: Moonfire
ComicInfo.Summary: Moonfire: Lost in the timestream, Kirby contacts Prophet from 175 years in the future and asks his friend to come rescue him. Prophet has to cut through the forces of Rego Spire to bring Kirby home. Once back at the lab, Kirby blasts Prophet in the back with his gun.
